info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:53PM EDT until July 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL SUFFOLK AND CENTRAL NASSAU COUNTIES... At 153 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Woodbury, or over Plainview, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. This severe storm will be near... Huntington around 200 PM EDT. Centerport around 205 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
